```{=html}
<div style="text-align: center; padding: 20px; font-family: Arial;">
    <p id="message">Checking your browser...</p>
    
    <script>
        // Prevent multiple redirects
        if (window.location.href.includes('?redirected')) {
            document.getElementById('message').innerHTML = 'Click the link below to access the survey:<br><br><a href="https://cornell.ca1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_5cqnAHFvK4k5jUi" style="background: #007cba; color: white; padding: 15px 25px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 5px;">Go to Survey</a>';
        } else {
            const isInAppBrowser = /FBAN|FBAV|Instagram|TwitterAndroid|Line\/|wv/.test(navigator.userAgent);
            
            if (isInAppBrowser) {
                document.getElementById('message').innerHTML = 
                    `<strong>Please open in your browser app:</strong><br><br>
                    1. Tap the â‹¯ menu button<br>
                    2. Select "Open in Browser"<br><br>
                    <a href="https://cornell.ca1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_5cqnAHFvK4k5jUi" style="background: #007cba; color: white; padding: 15px 25px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 5px;">Continue to Survey</a>`;
            } else {
                // Add parameter to prevent loop and redirect
                window.location.href = window.location.href + '?redirected=true';
                setTimeout(() => {
                    window.location.href = 'https://cornell.ca1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_5cqnAHFvK4k5jUi';
                }, 1000);
            }
        }
    </script>
</div>
```
